column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We didn't have to wait at all! I was surprised by this
column2: as the place was pretty full. Best pizza I've ever had! We ordered the classic
column4: or whatever but we were so hungry and excited that we just went with it and were very impressed. Great tomatoes! The only negative was that my fork was dirty and I had to ask a couple of times for a new one. I will definitely go back next time I'm in Chicago.
